Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hofton Avenue, south of the Northern City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: The City Walls rise nearly ten meters up from the ground you are walking on, giving the city's guards a very good lookout into the wilderness and deserts around Oceancrest. On the south side of the road is the Red-Eye Pub and Grill Stage, where various bards and minstrels go to practice in front of an audience.
